Package com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic

Class RequestService

java.lang.Object
com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic.RequestService
public class RequestService extends Object
Provides functionality related to animal adoption requests.

  • Method Details

    • createRequestValidation

      public static List<String> createRequestValidation(String name, Animal animal, User user)
      Validates and creates a new adoption request.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the adoption request
      animal - the animal in the request
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a list of validation errors or an empty list if validation is successful

    • updateRequest

      public static Request updateRequest(Request updatedRequest)
      Updates an existing adoption request.
      Parameters:
      updatedRequest - the updated request
      Returns:
      the updated request

    • findRequestByName

      public static Request findRequestByName(String name)
      Finds an adoption request by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the adoption request to find
      Returns:
      the adoption request or null if not found

    • findRequestsByStatus

      public static List<Request> findRequestsByStatus(Request.RequestStatus requestStatus)
      Finds adoption requests by their status.
      Parameters:
      requestStatus - the status of the adoption requests to find
      Returns:
      a list of adoption requests with the specified status

    • findRequestsByAnimal

      public static List<Request> findRequestsByAnimal(Animal animal)
      Finds adoption requests by the specified animal.
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal in the adoption requests to find
      Returns:
      a list of adoption requests with the specified animal

    • findRequestsByUser

      Returns:
      a list of adoption requests made by the specified user
